metadata.notes: smolagents is the successor to transformers.agents (deprecated in transformers v4.52)

tools.name: final_answer
tools.description: Provides a final answer to the given problem.

parameters.name: answer
parameters.description: The final answer to the problem

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Performs a web search for a query and returns a string of the top search results formatted as markdown with titles, URLs, and descriptions.

tools.name: python_interpreter
tools.description: This is a tool that evaluates python code. It can be used to perform calculations.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code snippet to evaluate. All variables used in this snippet must be defined in this same snippet, else you will get an error. This code can only import the following python libraries: ['collections', 'math', 'statistics', 'itertools', 'random', 'datetime', 're', 'stat', 'time', 'unicodedata', 'queue'].

tools.name: transcriber
tools.description: This is a tool that transcribes an audio into text. It returns the transcribed text.

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: The audio to transcribe. Can be a local path, an url, or a tensor.

tools.name: user_input
tools.description: Asks for user's input on a specific question

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The question to ask the user

tools.name: visit_webpage
tools.description: Visits a webpage at the given url and reads its content as a markdown string. Use this to browse webpages.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The url of the webpage to visit.

tools.name: wikipedia_search
tools.description: Searches Wikipedia and returns a summary or full text of the given topic, along with the page URL.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The topic to search on Wikipedia.
